Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Vehicle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    This class is the class used to control the vehicle that will sell the saleable objects to the market
